New York City officials are issuing cold weather safety guidance amid a Code Blue alert, while the NYPD reassures residents of no threat following a shooting incident involving National Guard members in D.C.; additionally, Mayor-elect Mamdani has made significant staff cuts at City Hall.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC officials issue cold weather safety guidance during Code Blue alert. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYPD monitoring DC shooting of National Guard members, says no threat to NYC. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipAFBVV95cUxNcWJKeWJEazVvSno0b1UyMlVqckVweThDTWxfMHhpbDludWtQUmtpR19XTDFBWXk1TVNkSE9qZV9xSXB3NklrWF9qdzRucmhNVm9oa3Q1cVZManhoYXNrVUFfVFh5cV9YUGZMalhpeVdIdU9WenlzNlBqWThCWE1OZkJrM1FIYktkR1Z2SDY5SWxtTVg2TW1DMzJfU3EzTUZMRHcxWA?oc=5)
- NY highways may be especially congested this Thanksgiving. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
